001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model;
002
003import android.graphics.Rect;
004import java.security.SecureRandom;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a meteor object within the game field. Meteors are elements that pose a threat to the
008 * player's ship.
009 */
010public class Meteor {
011
012  private final int METEOR_SIZE = 20;
013  GameField gameField;
014  private Rect meteorBox;
015  private SecureRandom rng;
016  private double gravity;
017  private int xPosition;
018  private int yPosition;
019
020
021  /**
022   * Constructs a meteor object within the game field.
023   *
024   * @param gameField The game field in which the meteor exists.
025   * @param positionX The X-coordinate position of the meteor.
026   * @param positionY The Y-coordinate position of the meteor.
027   */
028  public Meteor(GameField gameField, int positionX, int positionY) {
029    this.gameField = gameField;
030    xPosition = positionX;
031    yPosition = positionY;
032    computeMeteor(positionX, positionY);
033
034  }
035
036  private void computeMeteor(int positionX, int positionY) {
037    this.meteorBox = new Rect(positionX - METEOR_SIZE / 2, positionY - METEOR_SIZE / 2,
038        positionX + METEOR_SIZE / 2,
039        positionY + METEOR_SIZE / 2);
040    //Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), meteorBox.toString());
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * @param meteor Implementation details to check if the provided rectangle overlaps with this
045   *               meteor's rectangle.
046   * @return Return true if there is an overlap, false otherwise.
047   */
048  public boolean inside(Rect meteor) {
049    return meteorBox.intersect(meteor);
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Updates the position of the object within the game field by the given increment.
054   *
055   * @param increment The amount by which to increment the object's position.
056   */
057  public void updatePosition(int increment) {
058    xPosition -= increment;
059    computeMeteor(xPosition, yPosition);
060  }
061
062  public int getyPosition() {
063    return yPosition;
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Sets the Y-coordinate position of the meteor within the game field.
068   *
069   * @param yPosition The Y-coordinate position to set for the meteor.
070   */
071  public void setyPosition(int yPosition) {
072    this.yPosition = yPosition;
073    computeMeteor(xPosition, yPosition);
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Retrieves the bounding box of the meteor.
078   *
079   * @return The Rect object representing the bounding box of the meteor.
080   */
081  public Rect getMeteorBox() {
082    return meteorBox;
083  }
084}
